sn15.6:1.5: The purpose of these similes is to impress on the mind the incomprehensible vastness of existence. While it is doubtful they were ever meant to be literal numbers, I have done the math in a few cases. By way of comparison, the age of the universe in modern physical cosmology is around 13.9 billion years.
sn15.6:2.5: Assuming 2mm per mustard seed, and 10km per league, that’s about 5×10²² years.
